Issue.creator: dinotone
Issue.summary: Event Completions severly delayed post ledger commits
Issue.description: Running PTE with Single Network, 8 channels, 2 ccs, 96 threads, with duration of 60 minutes. After 60 minutes all the transactions have been committed to all ledgers (confirmed via peer logs), yet 20 minutes later PTE still only got EventHub completions for 8 of the 96 threads
